# Notification sound

**API Collection**

The default system sound for local notifications.

## Constants

- **UILocalNotificationDefaultSoundName**: Identifies the default system sound to play when a notification alert is displayed.

items.description: Identifies the default system sound to play when a notification alert is displayed.
